last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Rose's revenge steps up a gear and sees Faith having to fight for all that's dear to her. Will she be able to save the day or does Rose have more guts than Faith gives her credit for? Life also takes an unexpected turn for Faith as she looks to the future.

name: Keeping Faith
overview: Faith, a small-town Welsh lawyer, is forced to cut short her extended maternity leave when her husband and business partner, Evan, goes missing.  As the truth of his actions surface, Faith must fight to protect her family and her sanity.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Lawyer, wife and mother, Faith, is drawn into a mystery when her husband disappears

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Faith represents reformed criminal Steve Baldini. What does he know?

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Faith finds a DNA test kit in Evan's office and uncovers a family secret.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Faith discovers Evan has been working with a notorious criminal family, DI Williams starts building a case, and Bethan feels the repercussions of Marion's revelations.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Shaken by the aftermath of the break-in, Faith decides to represent an elderly farmer caught in a dispute with a ruthless landowner, while Arthur catches a lucky break.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Faith is questioned by the police after Evan's car is found abandoned. Williams adopts new tactics against Faith, while Steve risks his life and defies Tom and Lisa to help her.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Faith finds herself isolated as the custody hearing draws closer and Williams tries to frame her for Alpay's death. Steve returns to his criminal past in an attempt to help her.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Faith fights for her children in a court battle. Steve makes a pact to secure her freedom.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: We meet up with Faith Howells some 18 months after her husband Evan returns.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After Madlen sacks her lawyer, Faith steps in and accepts her murder case.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Faith tries to prevent Madlen from testifying.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Faith fights to keep her family together and restrain her feelings for Steve as Evan's release date approaches. PC Williams has news that threatens to swing Madlen's case.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Faith reveals worrying news as she continues to explore Madlen's case, the Reardons threaten to ruin the Corran Energy deal, and Steve tries to play a dangerous game. With on-screen English subtitles.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Faith searches for the woman who can turn Madlen's sentence on its head - and discovers the truth behind Wil's murder. DI Breeze makes one last offer to Evan.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: It's been 18 months since we last saw life in Abercorran and Faith and Evan's divorce and custody battle goes from bad to worse. Faith tries to be positive as she juggles being a mother and a lawyer taking on a new case, when someone from her past returns and threatens her happy future.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Unsettled by Rose's reappearance in her life, Faith struggles to keep everything together and focus on Osian's case. Evan decides to keep a closer eye on Faith's every move as Steve battles with his guilt.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: As Faith's mind is on helping Mike get justice for Osian and trying to keep Rose away from her family, she loses sight of the effect the divorce is having on her own children - resulting in Alys ending up in trouble with the police. Rose continues to cross swords with Faith.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Faith and Cerys find themselves fighting for Osian at the Court of Appeal in London, as Faith meets up with a friend from the past to get information on Rose. Evan continues to keep a watchful eye on Faith's every move, and Steve bonds with Alys.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Not happy that Faith continues to ignore her attempts to make amends, Rose puts the second stage of her plan into action, jeopardising Steve and Evan's futures. Time's running out for Osian, so Mike makes a difficult decision.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Rose's revenge steps up a gear and sees Faith having to fight for all that's dear to her. Will she be able to save the day or does Rose have more guts than Faith gives her credit for? Life also takes an unexpected turn for Faith as she looks to the future.
